column2:
"And that is why this project
isn't viable. Review it again
and adjust accordingly."
"Huh? Not again..."

"We have to redo it until it is
perfect. And for Theodore,
resubmit the report that you
sent the other day."
"Ehh? W-Why? I did it to the best I could."

"You are the ARKS Administrator's
aide. Your report needs to be
up to standard as well."

"There needs to be a reason why
you wish to mobilise the guards,
but there is no such reason in
the report."
"Eh, but.. I am new to this job."
"That is why I am telling you to include the reason. There is an audit soon, you get my drift?"
"I.. I understand."

"Then get to it, I am not exactly
free to nag at you as well."

"Oh, if it isn't <%me>.
Do you need anything?"
"1. It must be difficult huh."
"2. Aren't you being too strict?"

"Thanks for your concern,
however it is my job after all."

"Not at all. All of this is part
of my job, I do not mix personal
matters with official work."

"By pointing out small errors,
they will be more meticulous.
This reduces the mistakes they
make in the long run."

"ARKS is going through a shift in
structure. Which is why setting
things right is important."

"Because of Luther, Regius is
still cast under a negative light.
The other members of the
Council of Six is out of the
question."

"In that case, I guess I have to
take on the role of the bad guy."

"If sacrificing myself alone
stabilizes ARKS, it isn't a bad
trade off."

"Ah. There is no need for sympathy.
I love to point out the mistakes
of others anyways."
